p.span: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes the legal responsibility in relation to the patient held by an organisation.

Description.p:
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK LegalResponsibility subset with subset original id 6101000000137.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
